channel.title: Cryptography on Exists4All
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography on Exists4All

item.title: Analyzing CryptoAPI key extraction on Windows using CryptExportKey
item.description: Introduction I had to work on a PE for reverse engineering for a few weeks, the PE using an extensive amount of encryption/decryption of memory fragments to make it harder to reverse engineer it. However, that PE is for another time. But I had to write a manual encrypter/decrypter for those memory fragments to be able to patch some specific parts without changing instructions size and then crypting those bytes and replacing those specific memory fragments.
